name: cloudinary_js
description: Cloudinary streamlines your web applicationâ€™s image manipulation needs. Cloudinary's cloud-based servers automate image uploading, resizing, cropping, optimizing, sprite generation and more. Cloudinary's jQuery plugin allows direct uploading from the browser to the cloud and dynamic cloud-based image transformations and effects.

scripts.test:pkgs: for pkg in core jquery jquery-file-upload; do node_modules/.bin/karma start --single-run --cloudinary.pkg=${pkg}; done
scripts.test:pkgs:minified: for pkg in core jquery jquery-file-upload; do node_modules/.bin/karma start --single-run --cloudinary.minified --cloudinary.pkg=${pkg}; done
scripts.copybuilds: for pkg in core jquery jquery-file-upload; do pkg/copy_deployment ${pkg}; done

author: Cloudinary
